product-newsletter.title: Follow the evolutions of Open Terms Archive
product-newsletter.desc: No terms changes, only news about the product and its partners! Two emails a month at most, often less than that.
product-newsletter.button.label: Subscribe
foss.button.label: About the project
foss.subtitle: Open Terms Archive is free and open source software. Any entity can reuse and build upon it, as long as it shares its improvements with the community. The product is built collaboratively by all those who use and contribute to it.
foss.title: Contributive Digital Common
how.bloc1.desc: The terms of use of a service are targeted by contributors.
how.bloc1.title: 1. Targeting
how.bloc2.desc: Several times a day, our robots download and publicly archive the targeted documents.
how.bloc2.title: 2. Tracking
how.bloc3.desc: When changes are spotted, they are recorded and exposed for human analysts.
how.bloc3.title: 3. Analysing
how.bloc4.desc: We publish all versions in datasets enabling reuse and research.
how.bloc4.title: 4. Disseminating
how.title: How it works
reuses.memos-elections-fr.author: Reset
reuses.memos-elections-fr.subtitle: Tracks major platforms behaviour over the French 2022 elections.
reuses.memos-elections-fr.title: French Elections Memos
reuses.new_reuse.subtitle: If you want to build a tool with Open Terms Archive, contact us!
reuses.new_reuse.title: Your Tool
reuses.readability.author: Office of the French Ambassador for Digital Affairs
reuses.readability.subtitle: Computes the readability and necessary education level to understand a contractual document.
reuses.readability.title: Documents Readability
reuses.scripta_manent.author: Office of the French Ambassador for Digital Affairs
reuses.scripta_manent.subtitle: Consolidates all changes to a document between two dates.
reuses.scripta_manent.title: Scripta Manent
reuses.subtitle: Tools created by the community to shift the power balance from big tech towards end users.
reuses.title: Built with Open Terms Archive
reuses.tosback.author: ToS;DR
reuses.tosback.subtitle: The ancestor of Open Terms Archive! Since October 2020, changes displayed are provided by a dedicated Open Terms Archive collection.
reuses.tosback.title: TOSback
reuses.tosdr.author: ToS;DR
reuses.tosdr.subtitle: Lets users collaboratively rate how respectful terms of services are of their rights.
reuses.tosdr.title: Terms of Service; Didn’t Read
seo.desc: We track every change to terms of services to shift the power balance from big tech towards end users.
seo.title: Open Terms Archive
what_it_is: Open Terms Archive publicly records every version of the terms of digital services to enable democratic oversight.
learn_more_focus_areas: Discover how that makes a difference →
